
                            
                            <p>华为P70pro12+512，买了还没半年，内屏坏了，充电口也摔坏了，是不是要换框，能多少收，女大学生一手机。<img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/16/105632wnmnftcwfhautnuu.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/16/105632wnmnftcwfhautnuu.jpg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/16/105632b0ubxdhsbuf7m7q8.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/16/105632b0ubxdhsbuf7m7q8.jpg"> </p>
